name: Void Warrior
description:
You are a Void Warrior. Defeat wave after wave of increasingly challenging and diverse foes. Level up your ship, strengthen your shields, empower your weapons, and boost your thrusters! Power up with the armaments of your enemy and stake your claim as Prime on the leaderboard.

A shoot 'em up for solo or couch co-op play.

Features randomly generated increasingly powerful waves of varied enemies, as well as different power-ups and weapon types.
